name: LABYRINTH (itch) (GAMEINC20)
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/BD5qXoNARqymxm159

Eric is stuck in an apocalypse full of monsters that’s destroying his city. It is up to him now to try and stop this madness before it wipes out the entire human race. In order to do that, Eric needs to overcome all obstacles in the maze of a collapsing city and find the way out of it. He needs to find the main source that started all of this mess by shutting down the machine at the end of the maze. The adventure has just begun. Help Eric complete his mission. Maze your way out !
